Http.// Url: listening url for api server - allow set listening ip address and port number -> http://ip.ip.ip.ip:port/ or http://[ip::ip]:port/

AssetServer.// Enabled: set to false to disable builtin asset server
AssetServer.// ListenIP: listening ip address for asset server, default * -> all IPv4 and IPv6 addresses
AssetServer.// Port: listening port number for asset server (should be different than for serer api)
AssetServer.// URLPrefix: extra prefix in url, is omitted while getting path from requested URL ... if set to .com then request to http://localhost/.com/abc will return assets/abc file
AssetServer.// Mode: two modes: full - everything is local, partial - downloads assets from ProviderURL if not found locally
AssetServer.// ProviderURL: proxy URL used in partial mode
AssetServer.// AutoEncryptRegexp: regexp matched against URL local part -> if match returned file will be encrypted on fly using 3DES with AutoEncryptKey as key
AssetServer.// SubstituteMissingLocalAssets: when true if the game requests a High asset and you only have Low, it will return Low instead of downloading (partial mode) or error 404 (full mode)
AssetServer.// UseCache: when true store downloading in partial mode assets in assets-cache for use on next requests
